title: "Installation issue: STAT"
body:
==========
OS : Cent OS 7.3  Linux version 3.10.0-514.el7.x86_64 (gcc version 4.8.5 20150623 (Red Hat 4.8.5-11) (GCC) )  
Version : spack-0.11.2

$ spack spec stat 
==========
$spack install stat



Q1
==> No patches needed for dyninst
==> Building dyninst [Package]
==> Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j32'

2 errors found in build log:
     556    make[2]: *** 没有规则可以创建“common/libcommon.so.9.3.2”需要的目标“libiberty/libiberty.a”。 停止。
     557    make[2]: *** 正在等待未完成的任务....
     558    [ 11%] Building CXX object common/CMakeFiles/common.dir/src/addrtranslate-linux.C.o
     559    cd /tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/spack-build/common && /home/pluto2/spack-0.11.2/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++  -
            DBOOST_ALL_NO_LIB=1 -DBOOST_MULTI_INDEX_DISABLE_SERIALIZATION -DCOMMON_LIB -DUSE_PARSE_API -DWITHOUT_SYMLITE -DWITH_SYMTAB_API -Darc
            h_64bit -Darch_x86_64 -Dbug_force_terminate_failure -Dbug_syscall_changepc_rewind -Dcap_32_64 -Dcap_async_events -Dcap_binary_rewrit
            er -Dcap_dwarf -Dcap_dynamic_heap -Dcap_fixpoint_gen -Dcap_liveness -Dcap_mutatee_traps -Dcap_noaddr_gen -Dcap_ptrace -Dcap_register
            s -Dcap_stack_mods -Dcap_stripped_binaries -Dcap_thread_db -Dcap_threads -Dcap_tramp_liveness -Dcommon_EXPORTS -Dos_linux -Dx86_64_u
            nknown_linux2_4 -I/home/pluto2/spack-0.11.2/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/elfutils-0.163-jzcdj6impvtd7ormbkvyqjy4egdkamxn/i
            nclude/libelf -I/home/pluto2/spack-0.11.2/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/libdwarf-20160507-bfdrvnvkthtel7jh5x7kt2aoarypa2gk/
            include -I/home/pluto2/spack-0.11.2/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/boost-1.66.0-ibhknubcpt77sgrtv7bbeatyjnlvht5r/include -I/
            tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/spack-build -I/tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/spack
            -build/common/h -I/tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/common/h -I/tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyn
            inst-9.3.2/dataflowAPI/h -I/tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/dyninstAPI/h -I/tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-sta
            ge-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/instructionAPI/h -I/tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/parseAPI/h -I/tmp/pluto2/spack-s
            tage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/patchAPI/h -I/tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/proccontrol/h -I/tmp/plu
            to2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/stackwalk/h -I/tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/symtabAPI/h 
            -I/tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/dwarf/h -I/tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/elf/h 
            -I/tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/symlite/h -I/tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2 -I/t
            mp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/external -I/tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/common/sr
            c  -std=c++11  -fvisibility=hidden -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -W -Wall -Wpointer-arith -Wcast-qual -Woverloaded-virtual -Wcast-alig
            n -Wno-non-template-friend -Wno-unused-local-typedefs -Wno-deprecated-declarations -O2 -g  -fPIC   -Winvalid-pch -include /tmp/pluto
            2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/spack-build/common/cotire/common_CXX_prefix.hxx -o CMakeFiles/common.dir/src/addrtran
            slate-linux.C.o -c /tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/common/src/addrtranslate-linux.C
     560    In file included from /tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/common/src/MachSyscall.C:109:0:
     561    /tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/common/src/SyscallInformation.C: 在构造函数‘SyscallInformation::Sysc
            allInformation()’中:
  >> 562    /tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/common/src/SyscallInformation.C:4:1: 附注：变量跟踪大小越限，
            ·不带 -fvar-tracking-assignments 重试
     563     SyscallInformation::SyscallInformation() {
     564     ^
     565    -- [download 2% complete]
     566    -- [download 3% complete]
     567    /tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/common/src/arch-x86.C: 在静态成员函数‘static void NS_x86::ia32_ins
            truction::initFlagTable(std::tr1::unordered_map<entryID, NS_x86::flagInfo>&)’中:
  >> 568    /tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/common/src/arch-x86.C:1920:6: 附注：变量跟踪大小越限，请不带
             -fvar-tracking-assignments 重试
     569     void ia32_instruction::initFlagTable(dyn_hash_map<entryID, flagInfo>& flagTable)
     570          ^
     571    make[2]: 离开目录“/tmp/pluto2/spack-stage/spack-stage-pZfdx0/dyninst-9.3.2/spack-build”
     572    make[1]: *** [common/CMakeFiles/common.dir/all] 错误 2
     573    make[1]: *** 正在等待未完成的任务....
     574    -- [download 4% complete]




Q2
==> Warning: Spack will not check SSL certificates. You need to update your Python to enable certificate verification.

==> Warning: Spack will not check SSL certificates. You need to update your Python to enable certificate verification.

Q3
==> Adding package gettext@0.19.8.1 to mirror
==> Fetching http://ftpmirror.gnu.org/gettext/gettext-0.19.8.1.tar.xz

Q4
curl: (7) Failed to connect to 2001:470:142:5::200: 
==> Warning: Error while fetching gettext@0.19.8.1
  Failed to fetch file from URL: http://ftpmirror.gnu.org/gettext/gettext-0.19.8.1.tar.xz
==> Adding package libxml2@2.9.4 to mirror



Q5
curl: (56) TCP connection reset by peer
==> Warning: Error while fetching libdwarf@20160507
  Failed to fetch file from URL: http://www.prevanders.net/libdwarf-20160507.tar.gz
==> Adding package graphlib@3.0.0 to mirror

https://gnupg.org/ftp/gcrypt/libgcrypt/libgcrypt-1.8.1.tar.bz2


Q6
==> Fetching http://download.savannah.gnu.org/releases/freetype/freetype-2.7.1.tar.gz

curl: (7) Failed to connect to 2001:470:142:5::200: 
==> Warning: Error while fetching freetype@2.7.1



Q7
./spack install stat
==> Warning: gcc@4.8.5 cannot build optimized binaries for "skylake_avx512". Using best target possible: "haswell"
==> Error: An unsatisfiable version constraint has been detected for spec:

    boost@1.70.0%gcc@4.8.5+atomic+chrono~clanglibcpp~context~coroutine cxxstd=98 +date_time~debug+exception~fiber+filesystem+graph~icu+iostreams+locale+log+math~mpi+multithreaded~numpy~pic+program_options~python+random+regex+serialization+shared+signals~singlethreaded+system~taggedlayout+test+thread+timer~versionedlayout visibility=hidden +wave arch=linux-rhel7-haswell
        ^bzip2
            ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell
                ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell
        ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@4.8.5+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-rhel7-haswell


while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    dyninst@:9.99
        ^cmake@2.8:
        ^libiberty+pic

Q8
==> Fetching http://ftpmirror.gnu.org/libtool/libtool-2.4.6.tar.gz

curl: (7) Failed to connect to 2001:470:142:5::200: 
==> Warning: Error while fetching libtool@2.4.6


==> Fetching http://download.savannah.gnu.org/releases/freetype/freetype-2.7.1.tar.gz

curl: (7) Failed to connect to 2001:470:142:5::200: 
==> Warning: Error while fetching freetype@2.7.1
  Failed to fetch file from URL: http://download.savannah.gnu.org/releases/freetype/freetype-2.7.1.tar.gz
==> Adding package libpng@1.6.29 to mirror


Q9
dyninst requires boost version 1.61.0:1.69.99, but spec asked for 1.70.0



Q10
  Archive stats:
    0    already present
    0    added
    3    failed to fetch.
==> Error: Failed downloads:
gettext@0.19.8.1  libtool@2.4.6  freetype@2.7.1



Q11
spack build-env stat
==> Warning: gcc@4.8.5 cannot build optimized binaries for "skylake_avx512". Using best target possible: "haswell"
==> Error: An unsatisfiable version constraint has been detected for spec:

    boost@1.70.0%gcc@4.8.5+atomic+chrono~clanglibcpp~context~coroutine cxxstd=98 +date_time~debug+exception~fiber+filesystem+graph~icu+iostreams+locale+log+math~mpi+multithreaded~numpy~pic+program_options~python+random+regex+serialization+shared+signals~singlethreaded+system~taggedlayout+test+thread+timer~versionedlayout visibility=hidden +wave arch=linux-rhel7-haswell
        ^bzip2
            ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell
                ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell
        ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@4.8.5+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-rhel7-haswell


while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    dyninst@:9.99
        ^cmake@2.8:
        ^libiberty+pic


dyninst requires boost version 1.61.0:1.69.99, but spec asked for 1.70.0
[stat@gos spack]$ spack build-env dyninst
==> Warning: gcc@4.8.5 cannot build optimized binaries for "skylake_avx512". Using best target possible: "haswell"

I ran into the above problem while building STAT.I tried to modify package.py url &^ depending on the package, without any effect.

I think the 0.13.1 release adds some categories to the CPU platform architecture, with different errors in building STAT using different versions of spack.

Would you give me some advice?
==========
==========
==========
